endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available workforce skill assessment modules.
Submit the completion status of a specific skill assessment for a user.
Fetch the catalog of currently available training modules.
Enroll a user into a specific training module.
List all certifications offered by the platform along with details.
Apply for a certification exam associated with an identifier.
Retrieve the training progress and skill assessment status of a specific user.
Update the profile details of a specific user.
Obtain analytics data on the completion rates of assessments and training modules.
Submit a new support ticket for platform-related inquiries or issues.
